name: Twin Peaks
description: Twin Peaks is an American serial mystery drama television series created by Mark Frost and David Lynch. The series initially follows the investigation – spearheaded by FBI Special Agent Dale Cooper (Kyle MacLachlan) – of the brutal murder of a popular teenager and homecoming queen, Laura Palmer (Sheryl Lee), in the eponymous town. As the investigation goes further, several other mysteries and conspiracies, some even of supernatural nature, being uncovered around the town, all linking back in one way or another to Laura's murder.

name: Mr. Robot
description: Elliot is a young programmer who works as a cybersecurity engineer by day and a vengeful hacker by night . Elliot finds himself at a crossroads when the mysterious leader of an underground hacker group recruits him to take down the corporation that hired him to protect it. Due to personal beliefs, Elliot is not sure he wants to put the heads of the international conglomerates he believes are running the world and destroying it.

name: Lost
description: A plane flying from Sydney  to Los Angeles crashes. 48 passengers miraculously escape death and end up on an island lost in the ocean . The chances of finding them are slim to none. To survive in the wilderness, the heroes, who are very different people - a doctor, a criminal, a rock musician, an Iraqi military officer - must rely only on themselves. They will have to learn to live in peace with each other, otherwise sooner or later they will all die. The matter is complicated by the fact that the island seems to hide deadly secrets that the heroes are trying to unravel.
